source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Law Relating to Sexual Harassment at Workplace in India
items.headline: Must for all Organizations. Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013
objectives_summary: About the law relating to sexual harassment at workplace in India as under the Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013

items.title: Complete Resume, Career, LinkedIn, Cover Letter & Interview:

visible_instructors.title: Elvis Moleka, Ph.D.
visible_instructors.name: Elvis
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Author | Course Creator | Career Coach | Resume

items.headline: Go from a Job Seeker to a Hiring Manager - Resume that works in a Tough Job Market. Recruiting, Interviewing & More!
objectives_summary: Gain practical understanding of the hidden job market.
Learn how to avoid submitting wrong applications. You may have submitted hundreds already without knowing.
Gain understanding of the Recruiter versus the Hiring Manager approach.

items.title: Essentials of Human Resource & Emotional Intelligence
items.headline: Recruitment, Selection, Onboarding, Coaching & Performance Appraisals
objectives_summary: Main Terminologies
Job Description
Internal & External Recruitment

items.title: Collaborative Organisation: How to make it?

visible_instructors.title: Kalyan Das
visible_instructors.job_title: Happiness Coach, Corporate Story Teller and Speaker
visible_instructors.name: Kalyan

items.headline: Teamwork wins.Synergy can do so much.Change is not possible without collaboration,cooperation,consensus and alliance.
objectives_summary: IDENTIFY: the types, strategies and tools of Collaboration plan
LEARN: how to implement the key stages required to implement a successful Collaboration process
UNDERSTAND: what Collaboration is and the powerful competitive advantage it can provide

items.title: Setting Up a Structured On the Job Training (S-OJT) Program

visible_instructors.title: Katy Caselli
visible_instructors.job_title: Organizational Psychologist, Author, Speaker, Learning Guru
visible_instructors.name: Katy

items.headline: SOJT Vs. "The Buddy System" reduces errors, accidents and turnover. Gain control with a structured training system!
objectives_summary: How to Set Up Structured On the Job Training With Step by Step Instructions and Tools.
Why your organization desperately needs S-OJT no matter how small, large, old, new and in which industry.
How to select your experienced people and turn them into expert trainers to spread their valuable knowledge effectively.

items.headline: Human Resources - Course 1 (Workplace Investigations, Employee Engagement, Creating HR Budget, Salary Scales)
objectives_summary: A step by step guide to implement Human Resources Management solutions in the workplace
(Workplace Investigations, Employee Engagement, Building an HR Budget, Creating and Implementing a Salary Scale)

items.title: AGILE HR
items.headline: Why HR Needs Changing
objectives_summary: What is meant by AGILE HR.
How to influence and drive change in your organisation.
Approach all situations with a renewed sense of confidence.

items.title: Processing of Child Support Orders in the Payroll Department

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course focuses on the proper processing of child support orders in the payroll department.
objectives_summary: Explore the specific requirements for child support including deduction limits, deadlines, filing procedures, administrative fees and penalties/fines for violations under both federal and state law.
Identify the requirements for processing medical support notices.
Identify which garnishment has priority when an employee has current support orders, medical support notices and arrearages.

items.title: HIPAA and HITECH for Business Associates

visible_instructors.title: Merit Career Development
visible_instructors.job_title: Designing and Delivering High Value Continuing Education
visible_instructors.name: Merit

items.headline: A Step-by-Step Guide for Developing and Implementing an Effective Compliance Plan
objectives_summary: An overview of HIPAA and the HITECH Act.
Define the key terms that will be helpful to understand as a Business Associate.
Introduce how the laws define the role of the Business Associate.

items.title: Job Interviews - Complete Guide for Candidates & Recruiters
items.headline: How to Prepare and Succeed in your Job Interviews | Best Tips & Tricks | Firsthand Insights | Most Common Questions
objectives_summary: This course consists of 3 mini courses. Namely: 1) How to Ace a Job Interview, 2) How to Answer 8 Most Common Job Interview Questions, 3) Competency-Based Interviewing Explained. Aside from a lot of great content, there will always be summary lectures with the most important takeaways, and many practices and exercises to prepare for interviews.

items.title: Staying Safe in a Crisis for Businesses & HR Professionals
items.headline: Learn how to stay safe, avoid & respond in the event of a terrorist attack or any deadly crisis. Approved HR CEUs (3.5)
objectives_summary: Participants will be armed with knowledge that provides the basics to better protect your organization, community and personal safety.
You will be able to come up with an action plan to keep your business/organization to stay safe in the event of a crisis.
Participants will get simple, but crucial tips on what to do in the event they are caught in the middle of a terror attack or other type of violent mass crisis.

items.title: Talent Management: Applying the Fundamentals
items.headline: Learning the strategy of acquiring, developing and producing talented individuals for your organisation.
objectives_summary: Define what talent looks like
Understand individual and team needs
Evaluate an organisations talent management strategy

items.title: Effective Diversity And Inclusion In Business Environment
items.headline: Understanding how diversity and inclusion can help the organization to grow and be productive.
objectives_summary: Understand the introduction of the organisation diversity and inclusion
Learn key components of diversity and inclusion
Learn Hofstedes cultural framework as applied to china

items.title: Essential Employee Performance Management
items.headline: Learn how employees development enhance performance and productivity
objectives_summary: Understand the objective of employee performance management
Learn stages in development and implementation of performance management system
Learn competency management approach

items.title: HR’s Role in Corporate Governance: Board Basics

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: The course outlines the importance of HR leaders as contributors to effective corporate governance.
objectives_summary: Explore how and why corporate governance should work.
Identify duties and responsibilities of boards.
Recognize the importance of the role of HR to contribute to good governance.
